dict.acceptation: 先进的；高等的，高深的；年老的；晚期的；
前进(advance的过去式和过去分词)；增加；上涨；

sent.orig: Less advanced production teams have become advanced ones.
Build advanced culture and ideology while work hard for advanced material progress.
sent.trans: 建设高度物质文明的同时，建设高度的精神文明。

sent.orig: Advanced management system and advanced production equipment and perfect detection means, is product quality assurance.
sent.trans: 先进的管理制度和先进的生产设备及完善的检测手段，是产品质量的保证。

sent.orig: Click the Advanced Compile Options button to open the Advanced Compiler Settings dialog box.
sent.trans: 单击“高级编译选项”按钮以打开“高级编译器设置”对话框。

sent.orig: Advanced car is not equal to luxurious car, intermediate car is not equal to advanced car.
sent.trans: 高级车不等于豪华车，中级车不等于高级车。
